response.overview: Five stories were visually adapted using 3D scans of Toronto's Chinatowns to create immersive experiences where authors share their dreams, hopes and fears for Chinatown. In these interconnected future worlds, we encounter a Chinatown that cannot be contained, a home that is always changing and challenging us to be more expansive and inclusive in our shared vision of the future. This Toronto premiere reminds us that ‘Chinatown’ is not just a place but a lived experience, a community’s way of life, and an act of resistance.
response.title: Chinatown 2050
